name: Hedgehog Evolution | Mutant Opossum Porcupine Clicker
name_original: Hedgehog Evolution | Mutant Opossum Porcupine Clicker
description:
What happens to an ordinary Hedgehog when mutations start taking place? Combine hedgehogs to evolve them and discover their most curious, exotic and bizarre forms.

>Tap to knock out other hedgehogs
>Tap again to absorb them
>Gain experience and evolve

Suggestions? Feel free to shoot us an email at support@yololabs.com!
